mapper.sql: "ID" as "id" ,"ITEM_CLASS" as "itemClass" ,"ASEPSIS_CODE" as "asepsisCode" ,"ASEPSIS_NAME" as "asepsisName" ,"ASEPSIS_SPEC" as "asepsisSpec" ,"UNITS" as "units" ,"ANTI_PRICE" as "antiPrice" ,"NOBACK_PRICE" as "nobackPrice" ,"BELONG_DEPT" as "belongDept" ,"MEMOS" as "memos" ,"INPUT_CODE" as "inputCode" ,"VALID_DAYS" as "validDays" ,"CLEAN_PRICE" as "cleanPrice" ,"PACK_PRICE" as "packPrice" ,"ASEP_PRICE" as "asepPrice" ,"ITEM_ROLLBACK_FLAG" as "itemRollbackFlag" ,"FLAG" as "flag" ,"ORG_ID" as "orgId"
mapper.select: select a.id, a.asepsis_code, a.item_class, a.asepsis_name, a.asepsis_spec, a.units, a.anti_price, a.noback_price, a.noback_price, a.belong_dept, a.memos, a.input_code, a.valid_days, a.clean_price, a.pack_price, a.asep_price, a.item_rollback_flag, a.flag, a.org_id, b.dept_name, o.label from asepsis_dict a, dept_dict b,org_sys_dict o where a.org_id =#{orgId} and a.belong_dept = b.dept_code and o.value=a.units
